amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for the Department of the Interior to enter into or renew any concession contract except a concession contract that includes a provision that requires that merchandise for sale at units of the National Park System be made in any State of the U.S., D.C., the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands, American Samoa, or the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide that no funds in the bill may be used by the Department of the Interior to enter into or renew any concession contract except a concession contract that includes a provision that requires that merchandise for sale at units of the National Park System be made in any State of the United States, the District of Columbia, the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico, Guam, the Virgin Islands, American Samoa or the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Costa amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
